name: LianaMailer for Contact Form 7
author: Liana Technologies Oy

sections.description:
LianaMailer for Contact Form 7 is an integration plugin which integrates LianaMailer into Contact Form 7. It enables you to have newsletter opt-ins automatically exported from Contact Form 7 form to the chosen mailing list in LianaMailer email marketing solution.

Collect contacts easily from your WordPress site

LianaMailer allows you to segment contacts, collect email contact lists, and send device-optimized messages in line with your brand with just a few clicks. With this tool, you can develop your performance based on real data and comprehensive reports.

Save time and reduce manual work by using LianaMailer for Contact Form 7 to collect contacts, such as newsletter and guide subscribers, from your WordPress site.

Contribute and translate

LianaMailer for Contact Form 7 plugin is developed and supported by Liana Technologies Oy. Join our crew at GitHub or contact us using other means.
sections.faq:
Where can I find LianaMailer documentation and user guides?

For help setting up and configuring Liana Mailer, please refer to LianaMailer support site.

Where can I report bugs?

Report bugs on our GitHub repository.

You can also notify us via our support channels.

Where can I request new features, themes, and extensions?

Request new features and extensions and vote on existing suggestions on our official customer support channels. Our product team regularly review requests and consider them valuable for product planning.

LianaMailer for Gravity Forms is awesome! Can I contribute?

Yes, you can! Join in on our GitHub repository

Where can I find REST API documentation?

REST API documentation of LianaMailer product is available at our support site.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6 2023-03-31

  • Fixed: Replacing spaces to underline on LianaMailer property names.
  • Fixed: AJAX calls returns array instead of possibility to false.
  • Changed: Support for checkbox, radio and select inputs to map into LianaMailer.
  • Support For WordPress 6.2

1.0.52 2022-10-10

  • Fixed: Fetch mailing list properly from LianaMailer when “multiple lists” was not enabled.
  • Changed: Renaming few variable and function names.
  • Changed: Updated readme.txt a bit.

1.0.51 2022-09-23

Initial public release
